data.name: FunWar
data.detailed_description:
FunWar is a casual combat game, where your objective is to be the last one standing, for that you'll have weapons that appear during the round, besides your fists, of course, and a little luck.
The game was developed for a minimum of four players and a maximum of eight players, it currently has five different maps (City, Ancient, Street, Temple and
Storage) in addition to a wide variety of skins that can be purchased in the store for the currency of the match.
Currently the game has the local pvp game system, where you can create a public or private room and play with your friends.
FunWar is not yet complete, our idea is to add more content as the community needs it, we are always listening to tips and opinions in order to create an even better game.
data.about_the_game:
FunWar is a casual combat game, where your objective is to be the last one standing, for that you'll have weapons that appear during the round, besides your fists, of course, and a little luck.

Currently the game has the local pvp game system, where you can create a public or private room and play with your friends.
FunWar is not yet complete, our idea is to add more content as the community needs it, we are always listening to tips and opinions in order to create an even better game.
data.short_description: Challenge your friends in casual and fun combat and be the last one standing.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or equivalent amd
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
